snippet.title: Murder House - 80's Slasher Game. Wishlist on Steam!
snippet.description:
MURDER HOUSE is coming to Steam! A local news team breaks into an abandoned house to chase a salacious ghost story... until a MANIAC chases them! VHS era, 80's slasher game

WISHLIST now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1064460/

*Patrons will get steam keys if on the preorder tier. Plus DRM free version on Patreon.
*Stay out of the House is coming to Steam in July
*Tenebra (the plague doctor game) is still being worked on but it's a longer term project, so it may take a while.
